stimulusHtml:
The closed interval [a,b] is partitioned into n equal sub intervals, each of width Δx , by the numbers  x 0 , x 1 , ⋯ , x n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48BE@  where

a =  x 0 < x 1 < x 2 < ⋯ < x n − 1 < x n = b MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4EFE@ . What is lim n → ∞ ∑ i = 1 n x i Δ x ?
choicesHtml: 2 3 ( b 3 2 − a 3 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@437E@

b 3 2 − a 3 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4005@

3 2 ( b 3 2 − a 3 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@437E@

b 1 2 − a 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4001@

2 ( b 1 2 − a 1 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@426F@
